checks.name: Compatibility baseline files exist
details: policy, config, matrix, and fallback implementation files present

checks.name: Required browser/device projects are declared
details: projects present: chromium, firefox, webkit, mobile-chrome, mobile-safari

details: matrix summary: passed=1017, skipped=34, flaky=2, failed=0

details: worker bridge keeps crypto fallback imports and fallback execution paths

checks.name: WASM loader retains graceful JS fallback behavior
details: WASM loader performs support detection and JS fallback on unsupported/error states

checks.name: Transport selector preserves fallback chain coverage
details: transport selector keeps webtransport/webrtc/websocket chain with fallback controls
